verses.verse: "At <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2729>trembles,<s%> And <S%H9351>leaps<s%> from its <S%H4725>place.<s%>
<S%H8085>"Listen<s%> <S%H8085>closely<s%> to the <S%H7267>thunder<s%> of His <S%H6963>voice,<s%> And the <S%H1899>rumbling<s%> that <S%H3318>goes<s%> out from His <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H8478>"Under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> He <S%H8281>lets<s%> it <S%H8281>loose,<s%> And His <S%H216>lightning<s%> to the <S%H3671>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H310>"After<s%> it, a <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H7580>roars;<s%> He <S%H7481>thunders<s%> with His <S%H1347>majestic<s%> <S%H6963>voice;<s%> And He does not <S%H6117>restrain<s%> the lightnings when His <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H8085>heard.<s%>

<S%H410>"God<s%> <S%H7481>thunders<s%> with His <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H6381>wondrously,<s%> <S%H6213>Doing<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1419>things<s%> which we <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3045>comprehend.<s%>

"For to the <S%H7950>snow<s%> He <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H9094>'Fall<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%>' And to the <S%H1653>downpour<s%> <S%H4306><s%> and the <S%H1653>rain,<s%> <S%H4306><s%> 'Be <S%H5797>strong.<s%>'
"He <S%H2856>seals<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> That <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> His <S%H4639>work.<s%>
"Then the <S%H9130>beast<s%> <S%H935>goes<s%> into its <S%H695>lair,<s%> And <S%H7931>remains<s%> in its <S%H4585>den.<s%>
"Out of the <S%H2315>south<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> the <S%H5492>storm,<s%> And out of the <S%H2219>north<s%> the <S%H7135>cold.<s%>
"From the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7140>ice<s%> is <S%H5414>made,<s%> And the <S%H7341>expanse<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> is <S%H4164>frozen.<s%>
<S%H637>"Also<s%> with <S%H7377>moisture<s%> He <S%H2959>loads<s%> the <S%H5645>thick<s%> <S%H5645>cloud;<s%> He <S%H6327>disperses<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of His <S%H216>lightning.<s%>

"And it <S%H4524>changes<s%> <S%H4524>direction,<s%> <S%H2015>turning<s%> <S%H2015>around<s%> by His <S%H8458>guidance,<s%> That it may <S%H6466>do<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> He <S%H6680>commands<s%> it On the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8398>inhabited<s%> <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H518>"Whether<s%> for <S%H7626>correction,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> for His <S%H776>world,<s%> <S%H518>Or<s%> for <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> He causes it to <S%H4672>happen.<s%>
<S%H238>"Listen<s%> to <S%H384>this,<s%> O <S%H347>Job,<s%> <S%H5975>Stand<s%> and <S%H995>consider<s%> the <S%H6381>wonders<s%> of <S%H410>God.<s%>
"Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> how <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H7760>establishes<s%> them, And makes the <S%H216>lightning<s%> of His <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3313>shine<s%>?
"Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> the <S%H4657>layers<s%> of the <S%H5645>thick<s%> <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> The <S%H4652>wonders<s%> of one <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in <S%H1843>knowledge,<s%>
You <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> are <S%H2525>hot,<s%> When the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H8252>still<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H1864>south<s%> wind?
"Can you, with Him, <S%H7554>spread<s%> out the <S%H7834>skies,<s%> <S%H2389>Strong<s%> as a <S%H3332>molten<s%> <S%H7209>mirror<s%>?
<S%H3045>"Teach<s%> us <S%H4100>what<s%> we shall <S%H559>say<s%> to Him; We <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H6186>arrange<s%> [our case] <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
"Shall it be <S%H5608>told<s%> Him that I would <S%H1696>speak<s%>? <S%H518>Or<s%> should a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> that he would be <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> up?

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> men do not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H925>bright<s%> in the <S%H7834>skies;<s%> But the <S%H7307>wind<s%> has <S%H5674>passed<s%> and <S%H2891>cleared<s%> them.
"Out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H857>comes<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> [splendor;] <S%H5921>Around<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> is <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H1935>majesty.<s%>

"The <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> â€“ we <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> Him; He is <S%H7689>exalted<s%> in <S%H3581>power;<s%> And He will not <S%H6031>do<s%> <S%H6031>violence<s%> to <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H7230>abundant<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him; He does not <S%H7200>regard<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> who are <S%H2450>wise<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>"
